title: How to Start Switching to Clean Products
description:
Let‚Äôs be honest.

There is a LOT of overwhelming information out there about choosing cleaner products and cultivating a healthier home.

It feels like there are a million wellness accounts on IG, a hundred products that need to be swapped, an equal number of companies that claim to have ‚Äúsafer‚Äù products, and a ridiculous amount of harmful ingredients to learn.

So what‚Äôs a girl to do? How can you navigate cleaner and safer options without being completely overwhelmed? And where do you even start?

In this episode, Jordan answers all of those questions as she walks you through how to start choosing cleaner and safer products step-by-step.

If you‚Äôre looking to choose safer products for you and your family, without the stress, tune in to this episode to learn:

  • Why it‚Äôs important to choose cleaner products
  • Where and how to start your clean living journey
  • What to swap out first and why
  • The best brands and products to switch to

üëâ ¬† Want help switching to cleaner products? The Lifestyle Overhaul Guide is your step-by-step action plan to a more natural and sustainable lifestyle. Preorder the guide here.

Recommended clean products:

  • Primally Pure - use the code JORDAN at checkout for 10% off
  • Carina Organics body wash

  • Crunchi skincare line

  • Crunchi foundation

author: matt@jordanleedooley.com (Jordan Lee Dooley)
